Title: The Class
Writer: Ilmar Raag, Vallo Kirs (writing team), Pärt Uusberg (writing team), Lauri Pedaja (writing team), Paula Solvak (writing team), Mikk Mägi (writing team), Riina Ries (writing team), Joonas Paas (writing team), Kadi Metsla (writing team), Triin Tenso (writing team), Virgo Ernits (writing team), Karl Sakrits (writing team), Maario Masing (writing team), Roland Laos (writing team), Mikk Jürjens (writing team)
Actors: Vallo Kirs, Pärt Uusberg, Lauri Pedaja, Paula Solvak
Plot: Kaspar and the class pushover Joosep are 16 and life in high school isn't easy. Without meaning to, Kaspar defends Joosep against the bullying of his classmates, but every time Kaspar tries to him, it backfires, with the class taking it out on Joosep. Kaspar just wants his friends, his girl and his unassuming life back. Joosep wants to regain his dignity and the chance to switch to a high school far away. But their classmates are relentless, going further and further with each incident.
